member.name: T:Form.Attributes.OrmState
member.Description: Stores the flavor And context used for a particular connection. Takes the connection string and context.

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.SqlMapping
member.Description: A record type which holds the information required to map across BE And DB.

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.OnAttribute
member.Description: An attribute type which allows the specification of what fields/columns to join on to bring in ByJoin fields/columns... see ByJoinAttribute

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.ByJoinAttribute
member.Description: An attribute type which allows the specification of some FSharp Record Type fields being sourced via joinery

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.ForeignKeyAttribute
member.Description: An attribute type which specifies a Column name

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.PrimaryKeyAttribute
member.Description: An attribute type which specifies a Column name

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.ColumnAttribute
member.Description: An attribute type which specifies a Column name

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.TableAttribute
member.Description: An attribute type which specifies a table name

member.name: T:Form.Attributes.SchemaAttribute
member.Description: An attribute type which specifies a schema name
